name: Top-10 Stacktrace do dia de ontem

configuration.sql-command:
select tx_mensagemerro, count(1) as total_errors, string_agg(distinct nullif(tx_programa, ''), ', ') as programs, to_char(dt_cadastro::date, 'DD-MM-YYYY'),
 case row_number() over(order by count(1) desc)
 when 1 then 'one'
 when 2 then 'two'
 when 3 then 'three'
 when 4 then 'four'
 when 5 then 'five'
 when 6 then 'six'
 when 7 then 'seven'
 when 8 then 'eight'
 when 9 then 'nine'
 when 10 then 'keycap_ten'
 end
 from tb_ocorrenciaerro
 where dt_cadastro::date = 'yesterday'
 group by tx_mensagemerro, dt_cadastro::date
 order by total_errors desc
 limit 10

name: Clientes atualizados no dia de ontem

configuration.sql-command:
with hist_att as (
select ha.cd_cliente, string_agg(ha.tx_versao, ',') as versions, max(ha.dt_atualizacao) as date_att, ha.tx_nomebase
  from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cd_cliente ORDER BY dt_atualizacao desc) AS r, t.*
          from tb_historicoatualizacao t) ha
 where ha.r <= 2
 group by cd_cliente, ha.tx_nomebase
) select c.nr_cnpj, c.tx_fantasia, c.tx_razaosocial, split_part(ha.versions, ',', 1) as new_version, 
        split_part(ha.versions, ',', 2) as old_version,
        coalesce(ha.tx_nomebase, '_<não-coletado>_') as tx_nomebase
   from hist_att ha
   left join tb_cliente c on c.cd_sistemasuporte = ha.cd_cliente
  where ha.date_att::date = 'yesterday'
  group by c.nr_cnpj, c.tx_fantasia, c.tx_razaosocial, ha.versions, ha.date_att, ha.tx_nomebase

with hist_att as (
select ha.cd_cliente, string_agg(ha.tx_versao, ',') as versions, max(ha.dt_atualizacao) as date_att, ha.tx_nomebase
  from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cd_cliente ORDER BY dt_atualizacao desc) AS r, t.*
          from tb_historicoatualizacao t) ha
 where ha.r <= 2
 group by cd_cliente, ha.tx_nomebase
) select c.nr_cnpj, c.tx_fantasia, coalesce(nullif(split_part(ha.versions, ',', 1), ''), '<não-coletado>') as new_version, 
        coalesce(nullif(split_part(ha.versions, ',', 2), ''), '<não-coletado>') as old_version, to_char(ha.date_att::date, 'dd/mm/YYYY'),
        coalesce(ha.tx_nomebase, '_<não-coletado>_') as tx_nomebase
   from hist_att ha
   left join tb_cliente c on c.cd_sistemasuporte = ha.cd_cliente
  where ha.date_att::date between now()::date -7 and now()::date
  group by c.nr_cnpj, c.tx_fantasia, c.tx_razaosocial, ha.versions, ha.date_att, ha.tx_nomebase
  order by ha.date_att, ha.versions
